summary: 13 standalone eyebrows from the Better Females mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cqsqfyM.png[/IMG][/center]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CsQQmFX.jpg[/IMG]

[size=3][font=Palatino Linotype]This file contains 13 standalone Eyebrows for female Characters.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bPd2ykd.jpg[/IMG]

Manually[/size][/font]


[size=2]1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim's Data
folder.
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, and enable the .esp file.[/size]


[size=3][font=Palatino Linotype]NMM Install[/size][/font]


[size=2]1. Start NMM.
2. Double-click the name of the mod.[/size]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gpS34DD.jpg[/IMG]

[size=3][font=Palatino Linotype]Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2501668/?]BellaGail[/url] and her mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]Better Females[/url] for the Textures.
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and the CreationKit.

Regarding the images/the character:
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823/?]Iridum Eyes[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7403/?]Lovely Hairstyles[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36067/?]Vividian ENB[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/?]CharGen Extension v2.1.4 ECE[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]RANs HeadMesh Type C[/url]
-Face textures are a custom mashup.
[/size][/font]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HBpDatA.jpg[/IMG]

[font=Palatino Linotype][size=2]v1.2: Added two new Eyebrows, minor fix to the esp.
v1.0: Initial Release.
[/font][/size]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7CGpDXL.jpg[/IMG]


[size=3][font=Palatino Linotype]Manual Uninstall[/size][/font]

[size=2]Delete the following files:

Skyrim -> Data -> Textures -> actors -> character -> femalebrows -> Bella
Skyrim -> Data -> BetterFemales - Eyebrows.esp[/size]


[size=3][font=Palatino Linotype]NMM Uninstall[/font][/size]


[size=2]1. Start NMM.
2. Double-click the name of the mod.[/size]
author: BellaGail and Kalilies
